title.rendered: Australia vs Ireland, T20 World Cup 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Probable XI for Australia: David Warner, Aaron Finch (c), Mitchell Marsh, Glenn Maxwell, Marcus Stoinis, Tim David, Matthew Wade (wk), Pat Cummins/Cameron Green, Ashton Agar, Mitchell Starc, Josh Hazlewood

Probable XI for Ireland: Paul Stirling, Andrew Balbirnie (c), Lorcan Tucker (wk), Harry Tector, Curtis Campher, George Dockrell, Gareth Delany, Mark Adair, Fionn Hand, Barry McCarthy, Joshua Little

Pitch Report

Venue: Gabba, Brisbane

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 151

2nd innings average score: 145

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Bouncy wicket. Batters get value for their shots.

Weather: Scattered clouds. Very less chance of rain.

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Australian pacers love operating on the bouncy wicket of Brisbane. Their hostility is likely to bother the relatively inexperienced Ireland batters.

Given the lively conditions, the wicketkeepers from both sides are also likely to grab some catches.

Smart Picks

David Warner might have added only 20 runs in this World Cup, but he will be happy to return to the Gabba, where he slammed 2 half-centuries in his last two T20Is.

Similarly, Mitchell Starc will also carry happy memories of Brisbane. When he last bowled at the venue, he bagged a four-fer.

Curtis Campher and Marcus Stoinis have kept fantasy players happy through their multidimensional abilities. While Campher has provided 108 points, Stoinis has garnered 48 points for his efforts.

It was Andrew Balbirnie’s 47-ball 62 that helped Ireland beat England at the MCG. The fact that he doesn’t try anything cheeky makes him a safe pick. Moreover, he takes the onus upon himself to bat deep.

Besides inflicting 5 dismissals with the gloves, Lorcan Tucker has collected 119 runs in this tournament. His ability to play as per the situation makes him a useful pick in fantasy leagues.

Ireland will continue to bank on Joshua Little for regular breakthroughs. He has taken the most wickets (6) for his side in this World Cup. You never know what Glenn Maxwell might come up with. Against Sri Lanka, he generated 26.5 crucial points for picking a wicket and adding 23 (4 boundaries) with the bat.
